methods.description: Box Scores by Date by Competition

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: competition
parameters.description: An indication of a soccer competition/league. This value can be the CompetitionId or the Competition Key. Possible values include: EPL, 1, MLS, 8, etc.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the game(s).
Examples: 2017-02-27, 2017-09-01.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the game(s).
Examples: 2017-02-27, 2017-09-01.

parameters.name: minutes
parameters.description: Only returns player statistics that have changed in the last X minutes. You specify how many minutes in time to go back. Valid entries are: 1, 2 ... all.
